mapper.sql: ID, GROUPID, GROUPNAME, PARENTID, GROUPTYPE, COMPANYID,CHIEFIDS,CHIEFNAMES
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hm_pub_group (GROUPID, GROUPNAME, PARENTID, GROUPTYPE, COMPANYID,CHIEFIDS,CHIEFNAMES) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{parentId}, #{groupType}, #{companyId}, #{chiefIds},#{chiefNames})
mapper.update:
UPDATE hm_pub_group
GROUPID = #{groupId},
GROUPNAME = #{groupName},
PARENTID = #{parentId},
GROUPTYPE = #{groupType},
CHIEFIDS = #{chiefIds},
CHIEFNAMES = #{chiefNames},
WHERE ID = #{id} AND COMPANYID = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT par.ID, par.GROUPID, par.GROUPNAME, par.PARENTID, par.GROUPTYPE, par.COMPANYID,par.CHIEFIDS,par.CHIEFNAMES, grp.ID AS GID,grp.GROUPID AS GRPID, grp.GROUPNAME AS GRPNAME,grp.PARENTID AS PARID,grp.GROUPTYPE AS TYPE, grp.COMPANYID AS CMPID, grp.CHIEFIDS AS CIDS, grp.CHIEFNAMES AS CNAMES FROM hm_pub_group par LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.PARENTID = par.GROUPID AND grp.COMPANYID = par.COMPANYID WHERE par.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND par.PARENTID = '0' ORDER BY par.ID,grp.ID

SELECT par.ID, par.GROUPID, par.GROUPNAME, par.PARENTID, par.GROUPTYPE, par.COMPANYID,par.CHIEFIDS,par.CHIEFNAMES, grp.ID AS GID,grp.GROUPID AS GRPID, grp.GROUPNAME AS GRPNAME,grp.PARENTID AS PARID,grp.GROUPTYPE AS TYPE, grp.COMPANYID AS CMPID, grp.CHIEFIDS AS CIDS, grp.CHIEFNAMES AS CNAMES FROM hm_pub_group par LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.PARENTID = par.GROUPID AND grp.COMPANYID = par.COMPANYID WHERE par.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND par.PARENTID = '0' AND par.GROUPTYPE = #{type} ORDER BY par.ID,grp.ID

SELECT grp.id ID, grp.GROUPID GROUPID, grp.GROUPNAME GROUPNAME, grp.GROUPTYPE GROUPTYPE FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND rela.STAFFID = #{staffId}

SELECT son.GROUPID FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group son on grp.COMPANYID = son.COMPANYID and grp.PARENTID = son.PARENTID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.GROUPTYPE = #{type} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND rela.STAFFID =#{staffId}

SELECT son.PARENTID FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group son on grp.COMPANYID = son.COMPANYID and grp.PARENTID = son.PARENTID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.GROUPTYPE = #{type} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND rela.STAFFID =#{staffId}
